trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when a subsequent instance of a single-instance application is unable to connect to the first application instance.
trans-unit.target: 当单实例应用程序的后续实例无法连接到第一个应用程序实例时，将引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application differs from a normal application in that only one instance of the application can be running at a time.
trans-unit.target: 单实例应用程序不同正常应用程序中，只有一个实例应用程序可以运行一次。

trans-unit.source: When a subsequent application instance starts, it attempts to contact the first instance application to pass its command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 后续的应用程序的实例启动时，它将尝试联系要将其命令行自变量传递的第一个实例应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If the first instance cannot be contacted, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> is raised in the subsequent application instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法联系的第一个实例，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException>在后续的应用程序实例中引发。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Basic Application Model does not provide any context information in the exception.
trans-unit.target: Visual Basic 应用程序模型不提供在异常中的任何上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A single-instance application differs from a normal application in that only one instance of the application can be running at a time.
trans-unit.target: 单实例应用程序不同正常应用程序中，只有一个实例应用程序可以运行一次。

trans-unit.source: When a subsequent application instance starts, it attempts to contact the first instance application to pass its command-line arguments.
trans-unit.target: 后续的应用程序的实例启动时，它将尝试联系要将其命令行自变量传递的第一个实例应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If the first instance cannot be contacted, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> is raised in the subsequent application instance.
trans-unit.target: 如果无法联系的第一个实例，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException>在后续的应用程序实例中引发。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: A message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述错误的消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> inherits from <xref:System.Exception>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException> 继承自 <xref:System.Exception>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the properties of the <xref:System.Exception> object as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数设置的属性<xref:System.Exception>对象下表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）

trans-unit.source: The `message` string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> object that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 存放有关所引发异常的序列化对象数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> object that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> 对象，它包含有关源或目标的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object describing the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述该错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> object that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前异常的产生原因的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> parameter is not a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic), the current exception is raised in a <see langword="Catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Exception.InnerException" /> 参数不是 null 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 <see langword="Nothing" />），则在处理内部异常的 <see langword="Catch" /> 块中引发当前异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.CantStartSingleInstanceException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of the `message` parameter is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 参数的内容应为人所理解。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or a null reference if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性返回的相同值，如果传递到构造函数中，则为空引用<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>属性不会提供给构造函数的内部异常值。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.ApplicationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.ApplicationException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
The `inner` reference.
trans-unit.target: `inner`引用。

trans-unit.source: The `message` string.
trans-unit.target: `message`字符串。
